user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's engagement. Can you recommend some event venues, catering services, and decoration ideas? Also, find me some YouTube videos about surprise party planning to get inspiration. Lastly, provide me with the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds for budget planning.

TaskList.description: Search for event venues suitable for hosting engagement parties.
Look for catering services that can provide food for the engagement party.
Gather decoration ideas that fit an engagement party theme.
Find YouTube videos that provide tips and ideas for planning surprise parties.
Fetch the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds.
